title: Gretchen Rossi shares adorable photo set of three-month-old daughter
text:
Gretchen Rossi is 'loving every second' she spends with three-month-old Skylar Gray.

And the doting mother shared a series of sweet photos of her daughter to Instagram on Tuesday.

The Real Housewives of Orange County star dolled her little one up in a Halloween-ready onesie complete with a black tulle skirt and accessorized with a pumpkin-accented bow and matching socks.

Rossi, 40, accompanied the photos with the caption: 'Our little pumpkin is 3 months already! Can you guys believe it?'

Cute: Gretchen Rossi is 'loving every second' she spends with three-month-old daughter Skylar Gray, and she captured some of those seconds in a new photo set she shared via Instagram on Tuesday

She continued: 'Her little personality is really coming out! She loves to laugh like her Mommy, & she loves it when Daddy is silly! She LOVES music and she is loving getting to know her fur baby brothers more & playing with them on the floor.

'She is so alert, so strong, and I swear is already saying "Hi" & "ya" We are loving every second with her and she literally brings so much joy to our hearts every single day.'

Rossi shares Skylar with fiancé Slade Smiley, whom she became engaged to in 2013.

Precious: The Real Housewives of Orange County star dolled her little one up in a Halloween-ready onesie complete with a black tulle skirt and accessorized with a pumpkin-accented bow and matching socks

Proud mama: Rossi, 40, accompanied the adorable photos with the caption - 'Our little pumpkin is 3 months already! Can you guys believe it?'

There's mommy! She continued - 'Her little personality is really coming out! She loves to laugh like her Mommy, & she loves it when Daddy is silly! She LOVES music and she is loving getting to know her fur baby brothers more & playing with them on the floor'

Smiley was previously linked to her RHOC costars Jo De La Rosa and Lauri Peterson.

The two have yet to set a wedding date.

'We’re really content. We’re really happy,' Rossi told Us Weekly in February.

The pair went on a long road with in-vitro fertilization before announcing Rossi's pregnancy in late 2018.
description: Gretchen Rossi is 'loving every second' she spends with three-month-old daughter Skylar Gray, and she captured some of those seconds in a new photo set she shared via Instagram on Tuesday.
